oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Phase breaking effects in magnetoconductivity of YBA2CU3O7-DELTA and BI2SR2CACU2O8
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DHARD, CP
BHATIA, SN
SASTRY, PVPSS
YAKHMI, JV
NIGAM, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: high-temperature superconductors
high-tc superconductors
magnetoresistance
fluctuation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have measured the magnetoconductivity of YBa2Cu3O7-delta and Bi2Sr2CaCu2O8 in the magnetic field of 4T and analysed the data in the fluctuation region in the light of Aronov-Hikami-Larkin (AHL) and Bieri-Maki(BM) theories in their corrected forms and find the BM theory within the clean limit to describe the data more adequetely.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Conference on Materials and Mechanisms of Superconductivity - High Temperature Superconductors IV (M2S-HTSC IV),GRENOBLE, FRANCE,JUL 05-09, 1994
